titles.title: To make amounts provided under the Operation Safe Home and New Approach Anti-Drug programs available for use for providing law enforcement officers to patrol and provide security for housing assisted by the Department of Housing and Urban Development.

bill.summary: HUD Housing Security and Flexibility Act - Authorizes Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) field offices to use amounts received under the Operation Safe Home or the New Approach Anti-Drug programs for contracts with law enforcement officers or agencies to provide housing security or protective services at HUD-owned or-assisted housing.
